name: Uchu Kakumkei: Hashi No Umei
Description: During a great battle due to the massive amounts of energy clashing with two powerful gundam frames and their pilots clash of energies caused a rift to be opened and causing an unknown gundam frame to emerge from the void, after a few seconds it took position and started to attack any and all incoming attacks with high levels of combat experience and reaction speed beyond human. Little known to anyone else the person piloting the gundam was just as lost as everyone else and could only fight anyone else coming at him soon after the long battle all units except the gundam frames held the battle and continued for days until someone would reach a conclusion, all the while the unknown gundam sending a signal into deep space looking for something maybe even greater.
